game.name: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation
game.categories: Multi-player, In-App Purchases, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet
game.shortDescription: 『DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation』에서 플레이어는 「비너스 군도」의 오너가 되어 캐릭터들를 보조하면서 아름다움과 강함의 축제「비너스 페스티벌」에서 경쟁합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Koei Tecmo Games' DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation, players support the girls from the DEAD OR ALIVE series as they compete with each other in the Venus Festival - a festival of beauty and strength.

reviewHighlights.text: good game to relax and enjoy beautiful girls playing volleyballs.
um... I dunno, what do you think?
